sentence.Network_en: The trade pacts will spur an exodus of US businesses to Mexico.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些贸易协定将会促使大批美国企业涌向墨西哥。

sentence.Network_en: the mass exodus from Paris to the country in the summer
sentence.Network_cn: 夏日大批人从巴黎外出到乡村

sentence.Network_en: Lieutenant Malcolm said she saw no sign that the exodus from Haiti was abating.
sentence.Network_cn: 马尔科姆海军上尉说她没有发现人们大批逃离海地有减缓的迹象。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 是出埃及记（Exodus）该片儿中的钢琴曲，讲述以色列建国的辛酸历史，气势宏大，雄壮，很有悲壮的历史感。在有关此钢琴曲的MT…
exodus n大批离去成群外出exodus exonerate v免除责任确定无罪exonerate exorbita.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(三)|联想记忆法背单词 ... exit vt. 退出 n.出口； exodus n. 大批离去 exotic adj. 外来的；有异国风味的.
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... exile 放逐 exodus 大批离去,(移民)出国 exonerate 免除.

list.abs: ... Don't look past my shoulder 不要往我肩膀后看 The exodus is here 从这里离开 The happy ones are near 快乐离我们很近.
农业英语词汇_百度文库 ... plot,parcel,lot 地块 rural exodus 农村迁徙 rural population 农村人口.
地理相关英语词汇(3) ... rural depopulation 农村人口减少 rural exodus 迁离农村 rural land use 农村土地利用.

entry.def: If there is an exodus of people from a place, a lot of people leave that place at the same time.

example.ex: Lieutenant Malcolm said she saw no sign that the exodus from Haiti was abating...
example.tran: 马尔科姆海军上尉说她没有发现人们大批逃离海地有减缓的迹象。

example.ex: The medical system is facing collapse because of an exodus of doctors.
example.tran: 由于医生大批离去，医疗系统面临崩溃。

means.word_mean: 1. a journey by a large group to escape from a hostile environment

stems_affixes.word_buile: exo外部的,外面+centric中心的→adj.外向的,离心的
exo外部的,外面+therm热+ic……的→热外出→放热
exo外部的,外面+tic……的→从外面来的
exo外部的,外面+odus大批量→n.大批移出
exo外部的,外面+gam婚姻+y→n.异族通婚
exo外部的,外面+sphere球;大气层→n.外大气层

means.word_mean: (包含一大批人的)迁移；出走,外流,撤离；仓促逃离
